name: DevTeam.Space
tagline: AI-powered Community of Expert Dev Teams
description:
DevTeam.Space is an AI-powered community of expert dev teams. Our mission is to help more businesses build great online products.
Â 
Over the last 3 years, we have helped to 100+ businesses and entrepreneurs to build their innovative products. Including public companies like Airbus, Samsung, Carvana, and rapidly growing startups like Class Central, Poynt, Adventure Aide, and other businesses from around the world.
